name: Sensehq
description: Sensehq, We are a diverse, collaborative team committed to perfecting the way companies engage with talent. We’re creating a better experience for employers, recruiters, and candidates. Each team member has a meaningful opportunity to make a huge impact, and together, our team is evolving an entire industry. Modern enterprise recruiting teams are powered by Sense’s automated communication and talent engagement technology. From 2-way texting for recruiters to NPS; from recruitment marketing to candidate engagement and a recruiting chatbot; Sense is the only all-in-one solution built for enterprise recruiting. Sense turbocharges recruiting, marketing, sales, and talent care teams to dramatically improve the candidate experience and lower talent attrition.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline:
The Sense Talent Engagement Platform
 Fast,
 personalized
 hiring–at scale
ShortDescription: Sensehq heps in personalizing and Tailor the hiring for few or large vacancies.
enhanced_description: Sensehq is a talent engagement platform designed for modern enterprise recruiting teams, aiming to perfect how companies engage with talent. It provides an all-in-one solution for automated communication and talent engagement, offering features such as 2-way texting for recruiters, NPS tracking, recruitment marketing, candidate engagement, and a recruiting chatbot. Sense turbocharges recruiting, marketing, sales, and talent care teams to achieve fast, personalized hiring at scale, dramatically improving the candidate experience and lowering talent attrition. It helps personalize and tailor hiring for both small and large vacancy volumes, driving efficiency in the hiring process to help organizations hire top talent faster and more efficiently.
competitive_advantages: Only all-in-one solution built for enterprise recruiting
roi_benefits: Turbocharges recruiting, marketing, sales, and talent care teams
scalability_features: Supports fast, personalized hiring at scale
Capable of tailoring hiring for large vacancy volumes
